1.content: So with which character should we start?
1.title: LET'S BEGIN

choices: By the special abilty of some new pokemon
By one of  team rocket scheme
By his own friends and family
11.content: So, how is Ash going to be transformed into a kid or a baby?
11.title: Ash

111.content:
As Ash was entering the Kalos region for the first time, he came across a peculiar looking Pokemon.

"Woah! Who's that Pokemon?" He exclaimed as he took out his PokeDex.

The PokeDex stated that there was no information on this Pokemon as of yet. It towered over Ash with a tall, lanky body. The beast seemed to be ancient, yet so youthful at the same time. Its face was that similar to a cherub's but a body similar to a lion.

The glared at Ash. After a little bit of staring, the beast roared louldy. Ash covered his ears as he winced in pain.

Then, the Pokemon vanished.

"What was that all about?" Ash wondered.

Suddenly, Ash began to feel a bit off. He winced in pain as he felt every part of his body shrinking at an exponential rate. Ash then realized that he was either shrinking or.....getting younger!?

"What's going on!?" Now 8 year old Ash squeaked.

His regression stopped when he was.....
111.title: By the special abilty of some new pokemon

choices: Try To Retrace Ash's Steps To Find The Pokemon
Go Into Town To Get New Clothes For Ash
1111.content:
By the time the regression stopped for Ash, he soon was a 5 year old boy with Ash's clothes now loosely clinging on to him but Ash was barely able to keep it on as he and Pikachu made their way back to where Clemont and Bonnie had set up camp for them.

Bonnie saw them and said, "Ash what happened to you?!" Clemont added, "Why do you look like you're 5 years old?"

"I dunno, I came across this weird Pokemon, I was trying to see with the Pokedex just what it was but it turned me into this!" Ash said indignant at his current condition and dropped his pants.

"Can you hand me your Pokedex?" Clemont asked Ash. "Sure" Ash said and handed him his Pokedex.

Clemont tried to access the last pokemon shown but all the pokedex showed him was an unknown pokemon image, "This is unreal, that's an undiscovered pokemon right there!"

"It ran off after it made me 5 again...What are we going to do?!" Ash asked

Bianca soon raised her voice to say
1111.title: A 5 Year Old Ash

choices: Head To A Children's Clothing Store
11112.content:
"Well first things first, those clothes are only just going to drag us back if you need to hold onto them" Bianca said to Ash before adding, "We need to go into town and get new clothes for Ash before heading out for that Pokemon"

Clemont nodded in approval saying, "Yeah, I think that would be best"

Ash frowned before saying, "But what if it gets away while we're shopping?"

"Pokemon tend to stay in grounds it's familiar with, it'll still be here" Bianca said to Ash who then nodded and said, "Okay, but after that it's time to hunt down that Pokemon!"

After Ash said that Clemont picked Ash up who said, "Hey what gives?!"

"It'll be quicker for us if I carry you" Clemont said as Pikachu got on his shoulders and then everyone went off to the town.
11112.title: Into The Town

111121.content:
Almost as soon as they entered the town, Clemont and Bianca searched for a children's clothing store and soon found one and began picking out clothes for Ash.

Ash however thought they were getting too many clothes and asked, "Why are guys getting so many clothes for me?"

Clemont responded, "We have no idea, how long you'll be like this, it could be temporary or it could be for a long time, so we're just making sure we're prepared for anything"

Bianca had wasted no time picking out many clothes for a 5-year old boy, and Clemont and Bianca soon led Ash into the fitting room with all of them looking at the clothes Bianca had picked out while Clemont carried Ash and Pikachu.

However Ash saw one of the outfits and asked, "Bianca, why did you pick out a Kindergartner uniform?"

Bianca held out said uniform saying, "We may very well be here for a while, so we may need an excuse as to why you have Pikachu around, besides the Kindergartners here sometimes do pokemon battles with trainers"

Clemont said, "It would be a good way to fit in, you don't have to wear it if you don't want to however..."
111121.title: New Clothes For Ash

1111211.content:
Ash thought about it and said, "Okay, why not?"

Bianca smiled before handing over the outfit for Ash, and both turned away as Ash got himself dressed in it.

After he dressed himself he looked himself over in the fitting room mirror and thought to himself, 'Maybe I am just a little bit cute in this'

Ash was all dressed up in a blue kindergartner smock, blue shorts, yellow shoes, and even the hat as well in place of the hat that he normally would wear if it wasn't too big for him now.

Bianca squealed as soon as she saw Ash and Clemont had to smile as he saw Ash and said, "Do you like it?"

"I like it" Ash said after a while and Bianca soon led them out to pay for their outfits.

Soon enough after they finished shopping, Clemont and Bianca began to talk saying, "What do we do now? Do we find a place to stay, or go out to eat?"
1111211.title: Kindergartner Ash

11112112.content:
The answer to Clemont's question soon made itself known as Ash's stomach began to growl, making him blush and Clemont and Bianca laugh a little as they soon made their way over to a nearby diner to eat and soon enough they had a booth to themselves in a rather busy diner, and Ash was busy doing the kid's activities given to them by their waitress.

After placing their orders with Ash ordering from the kid's menu, everyone at the table began to talk with Bianca saying, "Ash what exactly do you remember about the pokemon who regressed you?"

"Uhh, I can't really describe it very well, it was tall and lanky, had a cherubic face and a Pyroar's body...Looked old but young at the same time....I don't know" Ash said a bit frustrated with himself

"There's gotta be someone who knows exactly what's up with that pokemon" Clemont said and just like that someone from the neighboring booth said, "You had someone who got regressed?"

"Yeah, I got regressed by a pokemon out in the woods, what gives?" Ash asked the man who responded, "You aren't the first to be regressed out there and definitely not the last, did you happen to get a picture?"

Ash brought out the pokedex and brought it up to the unknown pokemon and the man nodded and said, "Yup, that's definitely Puercitia"

"Puercitia?" Ash asked the man who responded, "This town was built around a peculiar legend around Puercitia, a man was seeking a way to be eternally young and came across Puercitia and then became a child again....People from across the world come here to try to get a glimpse of it, to see if it's real or just simply a legend....This pokedex proves it does exist"

"Is there anyway to reverse the regression?" Clemont asked the man who replied, "There's another part of the legend that says how to reverse it, the man who sought eternal youth soon grew bored of life eternal, of outliving those he'd loved and so sought out Puercitia to reverse the regression and so faded into dust."

"These regressions have increased as of late, you're now the 16th person regressed just in the past 2 months." The man said and Bianca said, "How come this hasn't come out in the news yet?"

"The scientists have come here to try to disprove Puercitia's existence tend to be rather cynical towards cases of supposed regression" The man said, "Since then we've taken towards keeping things rather quiet, we have a school and an inn in the middle of the town that serves as room for the regressed children and the school acts as a cover to hide them."

Clemont said, "There is no way to reverse it without seeing Puercitia again?" The man replied, "Yup, and Puercitia is rather skittish around groups of people, meaning most likely you will have to search for it alone."

"R-really?" Ash said as he looked at the man who replied, "Yup, it's a common happening, we can only find it in a one on one situation."

"If you need somewhere to stay, I can lead you to the inn and get you set up, plus having this young lad here" The man pointed to Ash at this point, "Get 'enrolled'" He did this with quotation marks being formed from his fingers "For kindergarten at school"

"It's not really kindergarten is it?" Ash asked the man who replied, "Most of the people were regressed to around your current age so the kindergarten is a front, not to mention their all pokemon trainers with their pokemon, we only teach you the kindergarten curriculum whenever someone comes around to take a look, more often than not, the time is spent for pokemon battles"

"Sweet! Can I go there?" Ash asked Clemont and Bianca who laughed and said, "I don't see why not, but sir why are you doing this and who are you?"

The man laughed and said, "My name is Tomoki Itoi but you can call me Mr.Itoi, the 'kindergarten' teacher at the school he will be attending and the head of the Puercitia committee, once you're finished eating I'll lead you over to the inn to get you set up." And with that the man went back to his food and Ash, Bianca, and Clemont quickly began to eat as well.

Once their food was finished, they went off with Mr.Itoi to the inn where he managed to get them a room, and soon enough they all went to sleep having had a tiring day....

What happens the next day for them?
11112112.title: Time To Eat

111121121.content:
The next day was rather busy at the inn where Ash, Bianca and Clemont were all staying.

For starters, Bianca and Clemont were both preparing to hunt down Puercitia in an attempt to capture it or to prevent anyone else from getting regressed by it.

Ash on the other hand, was getting ready for his first day back in 'kindergarten'. He was dressed once again in the kindergartener uniform he picked out from the clothing store and was all ready for a day back at kindergarten.

"Are you gonna be okay Ash?" Bianca asked worried for Ash

"I'm gonna be fine Bianca, Mr.Itoi said more often than not the time there is spent on pokemon battles so I'm gonna be good!" Ash said happily and Clemont had to say, "Looks like someone's ready for a day at kindergarten"

Ash only smiled at that as he got his pokemon all ready to go in their pokeballs, even Pikachu was in his.

After that was said and everyone was ready, they ate their breakfast at the inn before Bianca and Clemont walked him to the kindergarten where they saw Mr.Itoi right there who saw them and said, "I see all of you are ready, are you sure you want to do this?"

"I'm sure of it, the last thing we need is more regressions, and it'll probably be easier for you if there's more people searching." Bianca said and Clemont nodded his affirmation at this.

Mr.Itoi turned to Ash and said, "No inspectors today, so you'll be having a lot more battles with your classmates"

"I can't wait!" Ash said happily and Mr.Itoi lead him into the classroom saying to him, "One side effect of the regression that I noted thus far is that behaviorally you'll become more like how old you are in both emotions and in actions, keep an eye on that"

"Okay, Mr.Itoi" Ash said to him

"Alright then, feel free to go after whoever you want" Mr.Itoi said as he introduced Ash to the 15 other regressed trainers that were in the kindergarten. Over the time Ash spent getting to know these trainers, so he got to know they came from all sorts of places. Some were from Kanto like Ash, some were Kalosian, a couple from Unova and a couple of trainers were from Johto, Sinnoh and Hoenn.

Soon enough Ash found himself with two different 'kindergarteners'.

Colten was a brunette '5-year-old' who was really 16 years old from Unova, he brought his Braviary starter and a couple of pokemon he caught here in Kalos. The other trainer was named Victor and was really a 15 year old from Sinnoh, like Colten he brought his starter an Empoleon and had a couple of Pokemon he just caught from Kalos as well.

Who did Ash face off against?
111121121.title: Ash's First Day Of "Kindergarten"

choices: Flechinder is knocked out. Ash looses the battle.
Flechinder gets back up, hurt but awake. The battle continues.
1111211212.content:
"Hey Victor" Ash said, walking up to the blonde '5 year-old' boy "Wanna battle?" Victor's green eyes twinkled mischievously

“Alright” he said, pulling a pokéball out of his orange hoodie “You ready?”

“Heck yeah” Ash exclaimed, grabbing Fletchinder’s pokéball and calling out the fire bird, who looked at Ash’s five year old body confused “I’ll explain later Fletchinder” the boy said, petting the pokemon’s head

“Okay then, Meowstic!” Victor yelled, calling out the white and blue pokemon “Use psybeam!”

“Doge it and use steel wing!” Ash yelled, Fletchinder swerving out of the way as it’s wings started glowing white, dive bombing towards Meowstic

“Reflect!” Victor yelled, Meowstic eyes glowed blue as a large shining wall formed in front of it

“Fletchinder, look out!” Ash yelled desperately as his pokemon bounced off the barrier and crashed into a table with a bunch of toys on top of it “Fletchinder!” the regressed trainer cried, tears forming in his eyes as he ran to crash site and hugging the bird pokemon "Please get up Fletchinder...." he said as tears fell from his face.
1111211212.title: Battle with the shrunken teen, Victor

choices: Ash took the Chesping plushie along as they walked.
Ash dropped the toy and followed Serena.
11112112121.content:
Ash sniffled as Fletchinder lay on the ground unconscious with glitter all over his wings

“I win” Victor said happily, returning his Meowstic to its pokéball. Ash looked at him with tear filled eyes, he heard a female voice inside his head
“He hurt your friend, didn’t he? People who hurt others friends are mean right?” it asked softly, Ash nodded slowly, seeing the logic in the statement “Well, tell him that, tell him he is a mean little boy” the voice said again “Everyone needs to know, don’t they? Tell him, loudly. Remember what he did to your friend…” he clenched his small fists as more tears streamed from his eyes, he walked up to Victor, the voice’s words ringing in his ears

“YOU’RE A MEANIE!” Ash yelled at the top of his lungs before running off, crying until he saw a pile of cushions and plushies, without a second thought he jumped in, sniffling as he wiped the tears from his eyes

“Ash?” Mr. Ito asked as he crouched next to the young boy “What’s wrong?”

“Victor hurt Fletchinder” Ash sniffled, unconsciously grabbing a stuffed chespin from the pile and wrapping his arms around it “I know it was a battle, but I Victor was being such a jerk about it and-"

“Ash” Mr. Ito interrupted “Think about it, what did he do to be a jerk?”

“Well, he smiled when he went flying into the table” the regressed boy said “And he smiled when he passed out”

“That’s because he won the battle” Mr. Ito said “I know what happened now”

“What?” Ash asked before looking down “Wait, why am I holding a stuffed pokemon?”

“That’s what I’m talking about” Mr. Ito explained, looking straight in Ash’s eyes “Your mind acted according to your physical age. You started thinking like a five-year-old who just saw his pokemon get beat up and acted as such, it’s happened to a lot of them already”

“Really” Ash asked, taking his eyes off Ito to look at the toy in his hands, smiling slightly “Your kinda cute…” he looked back at Mr. Ito, who glanced at him worriedly “What?”

“I haven’t seen anyone slip back into the younger mindset that quickly” he said, waiting to see the boys reaction. Ash glanced at him with an uninterested look before returning his attention to the plushie.

“Mr. Ito!” a familiar girl’s voice rang through Ash ears, ripping his eyes from the toy he gasped as a blonde girl with a red shirt and red skirt ran towards them

“Serena!?” Ash exclaimed as his friend ran up to the director

"Ash? You got shrunk too" Serena asked, to witch the boy nodded

"Serena, what's wrong?" Mr. Ito asked

"Right" Serena said, snapping out of her shock "Nurse Joy and the mayor are coming over to inspect the school"

"Oh great" Mr. Ito groaned before tossing out a pokeball, calling out a Kirlia "Kirlia, clean up any mess and get them sitting down, I'll go stall them. Serena, stay with Ash" the pokemon nodded as Mr. Ito ran off to the front door as Serena reached grabbed Ash's hand

"Come on Ash" she said.
11112112121.title: Strange trantrum.

111121121212.content:
Ash let go of the stuffed Chespin toy and let Serena lead them to where Kirlia had the rest of the 'kids' sitting down clearly disgruntled at the fact of a surprise inspection and began trying to school their faces into expressions normal kindergarteners would have during a lesson.

Seeing everyone else do this, Ash schooled his face to make it look like he was fully into the lesson that Serena was 'giving' as a Teacher's Assistant due to the fact that Bonnie and Clemont were out dealing with Puercitia...

Ash was focusing now on Serena as gave the lesson that Mr.Itoi had planned out as the Kirlia soon finished cleaning up from the battles and went over to Serena as the door soon opened to see the Mayor, Mr.Itoi and the town's Nurse Joy enter.

"I believe I'll continue the lesson from here Serena" Mr Itoi said and then took over for Serena as the Mayor and Nurse Joy continued to watch before leaving after a while...

Mr Itoi continued to teach for a while until Kirlia sent up a couple of sparks in the air causing some in the class, Mr. Itoi included to exhale a sigh of relief that they left for now...

"They're gone now?" Ash asked to which Mr Itoi said, "They're gone, the Nurse Joy knows about Puercitia but officially she's with the Mayor on it being a hoax, she tries to give me a heads up on surprise inspections whenever she can but she seemed surprised by this inspection just as much as I am..."

"Are they going to be coming back soon?" Ash asked again to which Mr. Itoi replied, "It depends, if he's not that suspicious it may just be biweekly, if he's really suspicious it'll be daily inspections..." To which the rest of the class Ash included groaned at hearing...

"Finding Puercitia could give us a way to allow us to reverse your regression but given its skittishness this is something we'll have to deal with until something breaks through..." Mr Itoi said as the kids soon began to break up into groups as Ash went over to Serena and said, "You think someone can find it soon?"

Serena sighed before saying, "I don't know we may be here for a while" to which Ash frowned before sitting down to watch some of the other kids battle, particularly watching Victor's Meowstic fighting Colten's Swoobat before seeing Colten's Swoobat beat Victor's Meowstic and watched as Victor pouted before storming off into the plushie pile, Colten frowned at seeing this before seeing Ash and said, "Hey, wanna battle?"
111121121212.title: Ash Follows Serena

1111211212121.content:
"Umm sure" Ash said and came forward grabbing one of his pokeballs as Colten held out one of his and said, "Are you ready?"

"Yeah!" Ash said happily as he threw out his Froakie and Colten sent out his Skiddo making Ash frown a bit and said, "Let's do this Froakie! Double Team then Pound!"

Froakie did exactly as Ash said and nailed the Skiddo making Colten say, "Tail whip! Get it off guard!" to which the Skiddo managed to nail, making Froakie stumble a bit and Colten added, "Vine Whip!"

The Skiddo vine whipped Froakie making it hit the wall, making Ash come over and check in on it saying, "Are you okay Froakie?"
1111211212121.title: Battle Colten

choices: With a big smile "Yeah, that was a great battle Ash"
Tear filled eyes "What do you care meanie!? Leave me alone!"
11112112121211.content:
Froakie opened it's eye and looked up at the small boy, smiling

"Alright" Ash said, jumping to the side "Use Water Pulse!" the Skiddo attempted to jump out of the way, but was still hit square in the face

"Skiddo!" Colten shouted "Come on, you can get up!"

"Allright, now use pound!" Ash yelled, Froakie slamming it's body into the goat pokemon, knocking it out.

"Skiddo return..." Colten said, a red beamof energy coming from the pokeball. Remebering what happened to him and Victor

"You okay, Colten?" Ash asked, fingering his yellow hat, Colten looked at him
11112112121211.title: Turning the battle around!

choices: Nurse Joy (New Regressed Trainer Or Special Inspection)
111121121212111.content:
"Yeah, that was a great battle Ash" Colten said happily to him and shook his hand with a smile on his face before going off towards one of the toy chest in the room to play with them, Ash looked over the rest of the room and saw that the other 'kindergarteners' were now just acting like regular kindergarteners causing him to look over at Mr. Itoi and Serena where they were talking again before heading over and saying, "You got anything from Clemont and Bianca?"

Serena frowned and said, "Clemont got a sighting but Puercitia ran away from him" Mr. Itoi said, "It's always skittish, one thing that's common is that it always show up when a person is on there own...." Serena and Ash sighed at this before Ash yawned right after that and Mr. Itoi looked over at the rest of the class to see that all of them were beginning to look tired before Mr. Itoi called out, "Looks like it's naptime now"

"R-really?" Ash asked before yawning again and Mr.Itoi explained, "Now that you're regressed to a kindergarten age, your body gets tired more easily, hence naptime" As Serena helped out by rolling out naptime mats along with Mr. Itoi's Espeon...

Ash saw some of the others like Victor and Colten began to grab plushies to take with them while they napped, and Ash couldn't help himself before grabbing a Pikachu plush as Serena and Mr. Itoi watched...

Once they all laid out on their mats and went to sleep, Mr. Itoi and Serena went over and talked quietly with Serena asking Mr. Itoi, "Has there been a case of completely regressing both in body and mind by Puercitia?"

"There has been a case like that but it needed at least a year for it to regress completely....While they are embracing their more childish side, their minds are still mostly their older age, but the longer it takes to find Puercitia, the more their minds will regress until they truly believe that the age they regressed to are their real age..." Mr. Itoi explained to her

Serena paled at realizing that and said, "All we can do now, is hope for a breakthrough?"

Mr.Itoi nodded and said, "In the meantime, until we get a call from Nurse Joy telling me about another regression or from your friends Clemont and Bianca on a further breakthrough, all we can do is watch over them..."

Serena nodded and watched over the napping kindergarteners, Serena's gaze drifting over to the little Ash cuddling a Pikachu plush as he napped....

Mr.Itoi on the other hand soon had a call and answered it saying, "Hello?"

Who called and for what?
111121121212111.title: Smiling Back At Him

1111211212121111.title: Nurse Joy (New Regressed Trainer Or Special Ins...

11112112121211112.content:
"Mr. Itoi?" Nurse Joy asked over the line as he said, "Yes, Nurse Joy?" "I have a bit of bad news to relate to you though someone requested she be the one to say it..."

The sound of the phone being handed off could be heard as Bianca's voice rang out saying, "Clemont got regressed! I went into this grove as Clemont went into the other direction and Puercitia managed to regress him!"

Mr.Itoi grimaced as he heard this and Serena did the same as well before saying, "I'll go over and get Clemont and bring him to the inn" and Mr.Itoi nodded at this saying, "Kindergarten's about to end anyway, we're nearing the release for this class, so I'll bring them all to the inn since that's where they're all staying as well"

Serena nodded before heading over to the Pokemon Center and saw the regressed 5-year old Clemont and asked Nurse Joy, "Is he alright?"

Nurse Joy nodded and said, "He still has his memories, the only thing that changed was his age, It's the standard Regression format for Puercitia and I've given him some clothes to wear for now" Nurse Joy referred to the t-shirt and shortalls Clemont was wearing now before Serena said, "Thank you" to her and began to leave with Bianca and Clemont before Nurse Joy whispered to her, "The Mayor has been rather curious about the number of kids in the Inn for a while, I've managed to keep him distracted from that for a while but give word to Mr. Itoi that we may need to move all of them..."

Serena nodded before taking them back to the Inn where the news was given to all of the class and Mr. Itoi...

"I have a couple of places where I can put you for now, I have several connections who know the truth about Puercitia and isn't a hardline denialist like the Mayor...In the meantime we need someone to search for Puercitia..." Mr.Itoi said as Ash asked him, "Can we go out and search?"

"No" Mr.Itoi said and explained, "Puercitia's regression can go even further and make you into babies if you aren't careful, not to mention we have had that one case where the memories of a trainer was wiped the second time they found Puercitia"

The regressed trainers and Clemont all shuddered at hearing that before Serena thought about an idea she had on how to catch Puercitia but wondered whether or not it would be right...

Did she give out her idea?
11112112121211112.title: Clemont Regressed

choices: go to the store to buy supplies for Ash.
1112.content:
Ash was now a two year old baby boy. His clothing was hanging on him rather loosely, almost falling off of him. He then toddled toddled out of his oversized underwear and pants and looked around.

"Evewything so big," Ash squeaked.

He covered his mouth surprised by his newly acquired lisp. Ash was confused about what just happened, so he just toddled forward aimlessly, hoping to run into Clemont and Bonnie. Luckily, he runs into them.

"Cwemont! Bonnie!" Ash was trying to get their attention.

Clemont looked down at the little boy. He noticed how the boy's shirt seemed to hang on him like a gown. The boy seemed familiar, but he couldn't put his finger on it. Suddenly, he realized who the little boy was.

"Ash!? Is that you!?" Clemont exclaimed.

Ash nodded and raised his arms at Clemont. Clemont carefully picked up Ash and held him in his arms.

"How did this happen?"

"Some weiwd Pokemon caused it," Ash explained.

Suddenly, Ash began to pee on his now rather large shirt. Ash blushed and sniffled out of embarrassment. Clemont sighed and rubbed Ash's back.

"Shh, it's okay Ash. You can't control your bladder and your bowels anymore, so accidents will be happening a lot more frequently."

Ash began to cry into Clemont's chest.

"It na' faiw! Why this happen to me!?"

Clemont continued to try and calm Ash down until both the boy's crying and peeing had ceased. He then removed Ash's soaked shirt, prompting a gasp of embarrassment from Ash, and then wrapped Ash up in a blanket that he carries around in his backpack for some reason.

Bonnie looked up at Ash.

"He's so cute!" Bonnie squealed, "May I hold him?"

"Sure," Clemont handed Bonnie Ash.

Bonnie smiled at the now toddler Ash in her arms.

"Hi little buddy," Bonnie poked the little boy's nose, causing him to giggle.

"You're so cute!"

Clemont smiled at Bonnie and Ash. He supposed that since Ash was probably gonna be like this for a long time, they might as well make the most of it. Clemont decide the three of them should now...
1112.title: two years old

1113.content: Does Ash become a newborn, eight months old, or a year old?
1113.title: Baby or Newborn?

11132.content:
Ash's regression stopped when he was reduced to a crying eight month old baby boy nearly buried in his clothes.

What's going on!?Ash thought, still crying.

He didn't know what else to do, so he continued to cry.

Suddenly, _____ found him and picked him up
11132.title: Eight Months Old

choices: Meowth was unconscious somewhere in the shop
Meowth was reading a strange a book of the shop
113.content: "WE ARE BLASTING OFF AGAIN" Jessie, James and Meowtht were saying the famous catch phrase that has made the team rocket trio famous every time one of their scheme to catch pikachu fails, and once again they have failed. After flying for at least 30 minutes thy landed with a big blast into a weird shop. "Ouch that was really a painfull landing" said James rubbing his head." Yeah James, I hate that twerp, every time we try to catch his pikachu he has to sent us in space" responded Jessie "I agree Jessie, that twerp has no right to keep sending us flying only because we are doing our job" "Exactly James, we have to do something about that brat once and for all" " Yeah but what Jessie?" "We'll think of something James" and with that said Jessie and James started thinking of a plan to stop Ash, without realizing that there was member of their team that was missing at that moment. What happened to Meowth?
113.title: By one of  team rocket scheme

1131.content: "Wait a minute Jess, I don't see our feline partner anywhere" said James and Jessie confirmed what he was saying "You are right James, where is that cat?" asked Jessie with a very angry tone of voice, and so they both started looking for Meowth all over the place. After a quick search, they found their partner lying on the ground completly unconscious, Jessie then took the cat pokemon and started slapping on his face. "WAKE UP YOU IDIOT! WAKE UP I SAID" and so after a few dozen slaps Meowth woke up "Hey did you have to wake me up that way?" asked Meowth angry with his face completely red and twice as big as the original because of the slaps." I simply hate slakers, we should work on a new plan tocatch the twerp pikachu, not sleep on the ground of a shop" responded Jessie angry as well "Hey guys" said James "WHAT?" asked both Jessie and Meowth "I don't think this is an ordinary shop, look around you" continueed James and with that all three started look around and James was right, that was not an ordinary shop. It was...
1131.title: Meowth was unconscious somewhere in the shop

11312.content:
"This looks like an old Team Rocket lab," James stated.

Jesse looked around at the machines in the building. Sure enough, James was once again correct on his assumption. The lab was filled with all sorts of strange contraptions bearing the Team Rocket logo.

"I think I remember the boss talking about this place some time ago. He said it was used for creating items that would alter one's age," Jesse replied.

At that moment, the Rocket trio all stared at each other. A scheming smile spread across Meowth's face.

"I have an idea!" Meowth exclaimed, "How about one of you twos try and find a device that'll make Ash a helpless little baby!"

15311.content:
Zoey walked about the woods, closing in toward her next contest. Along the way, a small town came between Zoey and her destination. She looked around, noticing how there were no adults. A large, official looking building caught her attention. Zoey walked inside to see a maid woman in there.

"Ah! A visitor, would you be interested in taking my challange?" She asked.

"Uh, what's the challange?" Zoey asked.

"If you win in a pokemon sumo battle, then I wil give you my most valuable treasure." The maid offerred. Zoey agreed. "Now then, you will be facing my Ivysuar!" The maid declared and threw out the pokemon. Zoey nodded and reached for a pokeball when. "Hold it missy!" The maid said. Zoey looked up.

"What is it?" Zoey asked.

"You need to be the one going against my pokemon." The maid said. Zoey nodded. She stepped out onto the field. "One more thing, you need your appropriate armor, I'll let Ivysaur handle that." The maid said and stepped out of the room. Zoey looked at Ivysuar who motioned for Zoey over to a table. Zoey did as told and stood there. Ivysaur pulled her clothes off. Ivysaur then picked up a warm white cloth, and wrapped it around Zoey. The maid came back in.

"A diaper" Zoey asked.

"It's a traditional sumo attire, now, BEGIN!" She said. Ivysaur and Zoey pushed against eachother. After seconds of getting nowhere, Ivysuar slipped a vine into Zoeys towel diaper. Zoey giggled as she was tickled. Ivysaur moved onto her armpits and tickled. Zoey fell to the ground easily. Ivysaur lifted her up, ready to win. Zoey suddenly regained herself, and flipped off, and shoved Ivysaur out. "Congratulations!" The maid cheered. She retreated back to her room, and returned with Zoeys clothes and a strange pink crystal.

"What's that?" Zoey asked.

"Your prize, it's a special gem. By touching something with life on the side that's smooth, it regresses them, the side with the black pearl inside, progresses them." The maid said. Just then, Ivysaur plucked a sharp leaf and Zoey's diaper fell in half. "Heh heh, sorry, Ivysaur hasn't lost in a while. She's just congratulating you." She explained. "Say now child, now that you possess the artifact, what are you gonna do with it, revenge?"

"No, nothing too extreme." Zoey said slipping her clothes back.

"Well then, who could you use it on?" She asked.

"Hmmmmm, my friend Dawn I suppose." Zoey said.

"Alright, now who is this Dawn?" The maid continued.

"She and I have been rivals since our first contest, she's a tough one." Zoey admitted.

"Well then, why not use it on Dawn?" She suggested.

"There's no way I'd evict a friend from that competition." Zoey shot back.

"Hey now, she's hard, why not use it to catch up to her, life's not always fair, wouldn't it feel good to tease her a bit?" The maid suggested. A devilish smile crept across Zoey's face.

"It would." She said.

"Well, do what you please, but if you do any regressing, be sure to grab some diapers on your way out." The maid pointed to a store. Zoey thanked her and left. She had this great scheme, but was it right?

A five year old girl.

It was a hard thing to determine, since it had been so long since Dawn was that small. But seeing the scrape on her leg reminded her of the time she had fallen out of the tree whilst chasing a Pachirisu.

And speaking of falling...

With a wobble since Dawn could no longer reach the peddles, Dawn gave out a cry in terror as she fell onto the dirt path of Sandgem, Getting up, Dawn lifted the bike up and released the kick stand. At that moment, Dawn's skirt fell with a plop around her ankles. Dawn, squealing in shock, hiked up her skirt in embarrassment, wondering if anyone had seen. Fortunately, no one had, but her now overlarge sweater would have helped cover up her more private areas.

But Dawn was facing a new predicament. She still had all her memories and her companions, but how was she going to explain to herself how this happened and, for that matter, how was she and her bike going to get home safely? Then, she realized Mammoswine would be much larger to her, so if she asked, he might be willing to walk her the rest of the way, But, how would she explain this to Mom?

Then, she saw that she was right next to Professor Rowan's lab. Dawn could rush over and talk to him, asking if she could borrow his phone for this emergency.

15531122221.content:
May was planning on spending the entire week with Ash's mom, while she trained for the Kanto Region. Delia was super ecstatic; it had been years since anyone stayed at her house for more than a day. Her son was constantly running about exploring the world. Meanwhile, poor Delia was lonely, wishing for human contact.

She went through all the rooms, making sure no spec of dust was visible. To possible outsiders, she seemed to be worrying about nothing; she cleaned the house everyday, so there really was nothing to clean. That thought never crossed her mind though. She took a drink of coffee before cleaning, and briskly cleaned every square inch. By the time finished, May was still not going to arrive for about 4 hours.

Once done she walked down the hall to her special room; she opened it and smelled the fresh talcum powder inside. This was her dream child room. Before she had Ash, she hoped to have a baby girl and built this entire room for it. By the time she found out Ash would be a boy, she locked the room to intruders and set up a different room for Ash. Delia was keeping this room completely up to date though. Each day she would go into pretend she had a baby girl. She was about to do the same thing this morning, but something odd happened; she started regressing.

Delia didn't notice a thing at first. She just came in and looked over the crib, acting as if an imaginary baby was there. Meanwhile, ages started fading her. 36 35 34 33 32 31 30, By 30 she lowered one of the crib doors; she was going to continue acting, but she had no energy. So she sat on the crib, and then ages more rapidly left her. 28 26 23 19 14. As a teenager, she thought 'what the heck, I'm tired' and closed the baby gate to sleep in the crib. Her teenager self didn't mind napping in a crib for a bit, because she still had no idea of what was happening. At each age, she thought and acted like her age. After closing her eyes the last 13 years passed. 14 10 5 1. There Delia slept in the crib, like a baby. Her old clothes were being used like covers, except for her panties. Hours later, she made a poopy in it. Not much time passed though before the door bell rung; May was outside.

She rang the door bell a few times, unintentionally waking up a baby Delia. May was going to wait for someone to answer, but then she heard the cries. She didn't have it in her to let a baby cry. So she opened the door and quickly closed it. She walked fast toward the noise and eventually saw the lit up room. She ran to the room and was soon blinded by the lights. She was blown away. It was a baby room with everything a baby girl could want. The walls were pink, the crib was pink, the changing table was pink, and stuffed animals were across the carpet. She was in a state of amazement for a second or two, looking at the room features. Then she heard the cries again and soon realized why she was there. She leaned over to the crib, with curiosity. "Is everything alright?" she asked.

Here voice was soft and motherly, which distracted baby Delia. She looked up, cooing at this new figure. Her head tilted a little bit and soon she started smiling. Suddenly, she was no longer focusing on her poopy problem.

May reacted warmly again "Do you need your mommy? I-I don't know where she is but.." May had finally smelled the problem "ew.. looks like somebody needs a diapy change huh? Don't worry, I can do it. I've changed diapers before" She smiled gently and scooped up Delia, holding her nice and steady.

Once in May's arms, Delia just closed her eyes and sucked her thumb. May lowered onto the changing table, now realizing the clothes she was wearing. It didn't cross her mind yet, who this baby was. But, she knew how to act with babies; one must always stay calm to reassure the baby everything's alright.

May gently removed all her clothes, except for the panties. She held her legs and slowly removed the clothing. Delia was looking upset though, so May motherly said "Wow, you certainly did a number on this, now didn't you." She tickled Delia's tummy and then went back to work. She got a baby wipe and cleaned her up. Then she lathered her bottom end with baby powder." Wouldn't want you getting a rash, now would I?" Lastly she held Delia's chubby legs again to slide a diaper underneath. Lastly, She gently lowered Delia's legs and firmly strapped the diaper in. "Hmm.. you probably need a shirt, don't you?"

May picked up a now diapered Delia. Holding her in one arm, she looked through the drawers for baby shirts. In the first draw, she found an array of shirts and picked the first one; it was a pink baby shirt similar in color to Delia's pink blouse. May brought her back to the changing table and said "Hold still." She slowly put the pink baby shirt on Delia. May was filled with enthusiasm after finishing up. "Awwwwwwww, don't you look so cute! Now its time to find your mommy."

After saying 'mommy,' Delia responded, saying "Mama, mama!" Delia even motioned to be held again by May. This was NOT what May expected. The whole thing took her off guard, making her look anxious. She controlled her anxiety, picking up and doing the best not to sweat up. She carried the baby throughout the house calling, "DELIA! DELIA, ARE YOU HOME?" Each time she called, Delia responded, looking up at May. May ignored that and rushed to Delia's room. No one was there, but she did spot a picture of baby Delia. She rushed to the picture, stunned at what she saw. "So-so.. ya-your Delia?"

Delia giggled. May was then speechless. "Do you remember anything else?" Delia tilted her head and said again "Mama?"

May was shaking a lot and very anxious; her home greeter and friend's mom was now a baby. What more? She thought May was her 'mama.' If it wasn't bad enough, May and Ash were very close, so close they might marry some day. In other words, May's potential Mother-in-Law, now consider May her mommy. So, what was she supposed to do?

The problem struck May hard and she sat in a nearby chair to relax. Meanwhile Baby Delia was getting scared. "Ma-mama?" She hugged May tightly, hoping her mommy to send the same warmth back. May had here eyes closed, when she felt pressure on her waste. She looked down, seeing the cutest little baby imaginable hugging her waste. The adorableness of baby Delia, reminded her how much fun this was. Maybe she could handle this. Maybe this was meant to be.

choices: Go through the rest of the day with May becoming more attuned to motherhood
May's mom comes over. Insanity ensues
155311222211.content:
"Hmm.. well, this is going to be pretty life changing, but.. it'll just take time I suppose." May said nonchalantly

Baby Delia smiled "Mama!" she want to be hugged. May easily picked up on the signs and hugged her tightly.

May cheerfully said in mid hug "You know what? I love you! I just hope my boyfriend and family can accept our love."

After May's statement, Baby Delia's tummy started to growl.

May's acting was becoming more and more serious. "Awwwwww, Does the baby need her bottle? Yes she does" May nose rubbed Baby Delia and stood up, playing with Delia as she left. May took her to the kitchen and opened the cabinets eventually found some baby bottles. She checked the fridge and sure enough there was milk. May needed to free her hands though to pour the milk. She quickly explored the kitchen for a high chair; eventually she found one in the pantry. It was a bright pink high chair, like Delia's shirt.

May condescendingly talked to Delia as she positioned her in the seat. "Don't you worry about it snuckums. Mommy will protect her baby and feed her."

Delia played with her legs, while May poured and heated the baby bottle. Once it was ready, May held Delia in her arms and sat in a normal chair. She slowly fed Delia milk, like a true mommy. "Bottoms up. You're going to love your milky wilky"

Delia drank slowly, but with smile. May just hovered over her, making sure her baby was properly fed. Afterwards, May burped Delia. "There you go, don't you feel so much better now? Yes you do."
155311222211.title: May feeds Baby Delia

choices: May's Mom doesn't approve, but becomes a 1 year old as well
1553112222112.content:
Afterwards, May took Delia to the baby room to play with stuffed animals. The two were playing around happily, when the door bell rang. May decided to take baby Delia with her to the door, even if it wasn't a good idea.

She held Delia firmly in one arm, over her chest and cautiously walked to the door. Once she opened the door and saw who it was, she was speechless. "Mom? Wha-what are you doing here?"

May's Mom, Caroline, answered the question but was very confused about seeing a baby. "I just was dropping off your sleeping bag, you forgot it back at the house."

May was still awkward in conversation. "Oh, yeah. Thanks for bringing that. I'll see you later though. Bye"

May's Mom got serious, "Wait right there. What's this baby all about? Is Ash's mom making you look after her?"

May sadly didn't have it in her to lie. After all, she did intend to make this a serious thing. "Well.. not exactly. Come in"

With caution, Caroline entered. May walked her to Delia's room and showed her the baby Delia picture. Caroline asked "Why are you showing me this?"

May took a deep breathe, "Because I think this baby is Ash's mom. She looks just like the picture. Plus, when I came to the house, this baby was in a crib crying with adult clothes on."

Caroline was stunned by the story, and looked back and forth at the picture and Delia. "Wow... it seems, she is a baby now. I-I don't know what to say. What should we do?"

May nervously said, "Well.. I sorta already have an idea. She thinks I'm her mommy, and Ash is a close friend of mine. I can't leave her for someone else to adopt, so I've decided to adopt her. I'll be her mommy."

May's mom was flabbergasted "That... that's ridiculous! You can't be her mother! We still don't know if she can be cured!"

Delia suddenly started crying. May gave her a death stare and calmed the infant. "Mom.. we have a baby in the room. Please be quieter."

Caroline calmed down, "Alright... just you can't be her mother all of sudden."

"Why not? Look at this face and tell me she wasn't meant to be this way." May held up Delia to her mom. The two stared at each other for a bit, and then something broke the silence. Delia peed in her diaper. Delia started crying loudly "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHH"

May's Mom was annoyed, "Augh, right she's meant to be this way."

May ignored her mom and focused on her baby. "There there, mommy's here. You're alright."

May carried Delia over to the changing table and did a full diaper change. While doing so, she sung "La Di Da Li Laaaa"

May's mom just watched in amazement as her daughter performed flawlessly.
1553112222112.title: May's mom comes over. Insanity ensues

15531122221122.content:
After finishing the changing, May looked over to her mom "See, me and Delia over here are in perfect sinc."

Caroline complained though "Still, this is not right. You're too young to take care of her."

May actually started to tear up from this statement. "No... YOUR TOO YOUNG TO TELL ME WHAT TO DO!"

Caroline marched over near May, "Now listen up young lady.."

May cut her statement off, with a pacifier. "No, you listen up little girl. I am Delia's mommy, not just your daughter. "Now, if your going to act like a baby whose desperate for her needs, than I'll treat you as such."

Caroline was completely taken back; May had never talked down to her or like this. She was being treated like a little toddler. "May.. I'm sorry its just..."

May kept up her tone "Its just what? That's a verbal eraser. You need to be taught a lesson." May walked closer to her mother.

"Wha-what are you doing? I'm your mother.. "

May gave a warm odd response. She started treating her mother very differently all of a sudden. "No, you're not Caroline. I'm your mother. Augh, this is all my fault. I haven't been giving both of you equal love. Come here sweetums."

May put a pacifier in her mom's mouth and then lifted her up on to the changing table. She then started tickling her mom, which strangely caused her mom to regress. The tickling was rapidly regressing her mom, but her mom felt it. She felt herself regressing. 36 34 31 27 22 16. By sixteen she got in a question "why.. why are you doing this?"

"Because thats what mommy's do. They comfort they're loved ones. Maybe I need to change your diaper for you to see. May easily removed her mothers clothing. After removing the last of her mom's panties and letting Caroline's nakeness show, Caroline was only 10 years old. Then May powdered Caroline's butt, regressing her back to a 1 year old. May finished the changing with a nice tuggidy wuggidy diaper. Caroline was horrified, but soon that all changed. May tapped her nose and said "BOOP!" Strangely enough this regressed Caroline's mind completely. The next words out of her mouth were "mmmmm Mama!"

1553112222112211.content:
May remembered she was going to meet up with Ash at Pallet Town's park. Maybe she could show the baby girls off to him.

Later, Ash was at the park with his Pikachu asleep by his feet. He noticed May walking towards him and it looked like she had two girl babies with her, one in a stroller and one in a carrier on her front. Ash wondered where they had come from. Did May suddenly take up babysitting? And as they got closer, one of these girls looked... strangely familiar to him. Nevertheless, he waved to his friend and called out, "Hi, May!"

"Hi, Ash! You won't believe what happened over at your house," said May.

"What happened? Does it have to do with those babies?"

"Yes, it does," said May. And then she proceeded to tell Ash everything, how she discovered Delia as a baby in her house, how she took a quick liking to Baby Delia, how Caroline just so happened to come by, and how SHE got turned into a baby. May took Baby Delia out of the carrier and handed her over to Ash. He wasn't sure if it really was her or not at first, but May had taken Delia's baby picture with her as proof, and as he looked at the picture, then at Baby Delia, he was shocked by this.

This was a lot for Ash to take in. His mother and the mother of his friend had somehow turned into babies. And what's more, May seemed surprisingly okay about all this. Something felt off about the entire thing. May was talking about how this was meant to be, how she was going to be their mommy, and the events of how Caroline was regressed didn't make sense to him: how was it possible that Caroline could turn into a baby just because May treated her like one? There wasn't an explanation for how Delia got regressed, since, from what May told him, she FOUND her like this, but Caroline's regression was just strange.

"This..." Ash said, "...this isn't right."

"What?" asked May with disbelief.

"This isn't right!" Ash said, a little louder, "You're acting all strange and our moms are now babies! We can't just leave them like this! We have to tell Professor Oak or someone to see if they could help get them back to normal."

"W-wait, Ash," May quickly protested, "don't do it! Not now. Think about it: wouldn't you like to play with your mom as a little tiny baby? Wouldn't it be neat to take care of her for a change?"

Ash listened as May tried to convince him, then he looked back down at Baby Delia. She looked up at Ash with the most precious look on her face and uttered "Da-da?" Ash couldn't believe it. His own mom now thought that he was her daddy. At that moment, he made up his mind.

What does Ash do?
1553112222112211.title: May took the babies to the park

choices: Let the babies play in the park for a little while
Take the babies back home for now
15531122221122112.content:
As Ash looked down at the baby girl in his arms that had been his mother, he couldn't help but feel a twinge of guilt. At the age of ten, he set out on his own to become a Pokemon Master, leaving his mom with an empty nest. Sure, he tried to visit her whenever he could, but most of the time, she was left mostly by her lonesome. And he had to admit that while he did want to be a Pokemon Master, there were times when he did miss his mom. He wasn't fond of her more embarrassing tendencies, but he did still want to be able to bond with her whenever he could. Now that she was reduced to the state of a mere toddler, how would bonding work now?

But now that May mentioned it, he did think it'd be interesting to be looking after Delia like this. She did look quite cute as a baby, after all, and it would certainly be a different experience from looking after his Pokemon. He wasn't really looking forward to the... messier parts of childcare, but as long as they could find a way to turn her and Caroline back, then maybe this could actually be fun, and he might even be able to spend time and bond with her in the process.

Besides, he wouldn't have to worry about her reminding him to change his underwear when she was too young to worry about keeping HERS clean!

When Baby Delia called him "Da-da", that was when Ash lost most of his resistance. He hugged her close to his chest, now feeling not only the warmth of love, but also the desire to protect and take care of her, just like how he protects and takes care of Pikachu. Delia, meanwhile, had grabbed onto Ash's shirt, feeling comforted as she placed her head against his chest, listened to his heartbeat, and softly breathed.

Ash did have his previous concerns still in mind, but he reluctantly put those aside as he stroked Delia's hair and back, comforting her even further. As he let go from the hug, he looked at May and sighed in defeat.

"Alright," said Ash, "they can stay like this for now. But I still think we should find a way to return them to normal eventually."

"YAY!" cheered May as she cuddled Baby Caroline.

"Dada! Dada!" Delia giggled happily as she hugged into his chest again.

What am I getting myself into? Ash thought to himself.

What do they do next?
15531122221122112.title: Leave the babies like this for a while
